benchmark_details.name: WalkieKnowledge
benchmark_details.overview: WalkieKnowledge is a new evaluation benchmark with about 200 manually annotated questions across 8 diverse trajectories, enabling fair comparison between structured approaches and general-purpose VLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of visual scene understanding capabilities through diverse query types including scene description, spatial relations, object search, and action-place association.

data.source: Based on the EgoWalk dataset, spanning diverse indoor and outdoor environments with rich temporal annotations.
data.annotation: Manually annotated questions linked to ground truth frame intervals.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on retrieval and answer correctness in assessing model performance.
methodology.interpretation: Higher retrieval and answer accuracy indicates better performance in locating correct frames and answering correctly.
methodology.validation: Evaluated against state-of-the-art VLMs and methods.
